original_text: But Pharaoh's mind was hard and he refused to listen to Moses and Aaron. That was what the Lord had said would happen, and it did!
korean_text: 그러나 바로의 마음이 완악하여 그들의 말을 듣지 아니하니 여호와의 말씀과 같더라

sentences.original_text: and he refused to listen to Moses and Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모세와 아론의 말을 듣기를 거절했습니다

sentences.original_text: That was what the Lord had said would happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 주께서 일어날 것이라고 말씀하신 것이었습니다
